snippet.title: \- e-Literate
snippet.description: * \- e-Literate (clueweb12-0007wb-99-29045) http://mfeldstein.com/rhiz-o-matic-scaling-the-mooc/ ...reach other people and solve other problems? In particular, while I hear a lot of talk from open education proponents about democratization, most of the experiments around MOOCs and the like seem to take as students mostly…well…people who are blogging about how great MOOCs could be. There’s nothing wrong with that if the purpose is to learn how to do better MOOCs, or if the goal is just personal fulfillment, but it’s not clear to me... [cached version]
